statements: SELECT * FROM travel_expenditures ORDER BY expense_date DESC, amount ASC;
SELECT report_name, spending_category, amount FROM travel_expenditures WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT report_id, report_name, expense_date FROM travel_expenditures WHERE spending_category = 'Hotel';
SELECT * FROM travel_expenditures WHERE report_name LIKE 'Business%';
SELECT MAX(amount) AS max_amount FROM travel_expenditures;
SELECT * FROM travel_expenditures WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY expense_date DESC, report_name ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT report_name, amount FROM travel_expenditures WHERE spending_category = 'Accommodation' AND expense_date >= '2021-01-01'
SELECT spending_category, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM travel_expenditures GROUP BY spending_category ORDER BY total_amount DESC
SELECT report_name, amount, expense_date FROM travel_expenditures WHERE amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000
SELECT * FROM travel_expenditures WHERE report_name LIKE '%business%' AND spending_category IN ('Meals', 'Transportation')
SELECT * FROM travel_expenditures WHERE expenditure_amount > 1000;
SELECT department, employee_name FROM travel_expenditures WHERE department = 'Sales';
SELECT id, travel_date, expenditure_amount FROM travel_expenditures WHERE travel_destination = 'Paris';
SELECT * FROM travel_expenditures ORDER BY travel_date DESC;
SELECT employee_name, expenditure_amount FROM travel_expenditures WHERE expenditure_amount < 500 AND department = 'Marketing';
SELECT * FROM travel_expenditures WHERE expenditure_amount > 1000 ORDER BY travel_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT employee_name, department, travel_destination FROM travel_expenditures WHERE department = 'Finance' ORDER BY expenditure_amount ASC
SELECT department, SUM(expenditure_amount) AS total_expenditure FROM travel_expenditures GROUP BY department HAVING total_expenditure > 5000 ORDER BY total_expenditure DESC
SELECT employee_name, department, budget_limit FROM travel_expenditures AS t JOIN budget_limits AS b ON t.department = b.department AND t.expenditure_amount > b.budget_limit

SELECT employee_name, department, travel_destination, expenditure_amount, budget_limit FROM travel_expenditures AS t LEFT JOIN budget_limits AS b ON t.department = b.department WHERE budget_limit IS NULL
SELECT * FROM travel_expenses;
SELECT * FROM budget_limits ORDER BY monthly_limit DESC;
SELECT report_id, amount FROM travel_expenses WHERE employee_id = 101;
SELECT category, SUM(amount) AS total_expenses FROM travel_expenses GROUP BY category;
SELECT * FROM cost_saving_opportunities WHERE category = 'Transportation';
SELECT * FROM travel_expenses WHERE employee_id = 100 ORDER BY expense_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT employee_id, category, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM travel_expenses GROUP BY employee_id, category HAVING total_amount > 5000;
SELECT t.employee_id, t.expense_date, t.amount, b.monthly_limit FROM travel_expenses t INNER JOIN budget_limits b ON t.category = b.category;
SELECT MAX(amount) AS max_amount, MIN(amount) AS min_amount FROM travel_expenses;
SELECT category, COUNT(*) AS num_expenses FROM travel_expenses GROUP BY category ORDER BY num_expenses DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM travel_reports;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name FROM employees WHERE department = 'Marketing';
SELECT report_id, total_expenses FROM travel_reports WHERE employee_id = 123 ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT expense_date, SUM(expense_amount) AS total_expenses FROM expenses GROUP BY expense_date;
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(report_id) AS num_reports FROM travel_reports GROUP BY employee_id HAVING num_reports > 3;
SELECT * FROM travel_reports WHERE total_expenses > 5000 ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT report_id, employee_id, SUM(total_expenses) AS total_spent FROM travel_reports GROUP BY report_id, employee_id;
SELECT e.employee_name, e.department, tr.total_expenses FROM employees e JOIN travel_reports tr ON e.employee_id = tr.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE expense_amount < 1000 ORDER BY expense_date ASC;
SELECT department, SUM(budget_limit) AS total_budget FROM budgets GROUP BY department HAVING total_budget > 10000;
SELECT * FROM guest_expenses ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT guest_id, expense_type, expense_amount FROM guest_expenses WHERE expense_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT budget_type, budget_limit FROM travel_budget WHERE budget_limit > 1000 ORDER BY budget_limit ASC;
SELECT id, total_expenditure, budget_type FROM expenditure_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT opportunity_name, potential_savings FROM cost_savings_opportunities WHERE opportunity_date < '2022-08-15';
SELECT * FROM guest_expenses ORDER BY expense_amount DESC, expense_date ASC;
SELECT guest_id, expense_type, expense_amount FROM guest_expenses WHERE expense_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY guest_id ASC;
SELECT category_name, COUNT(*) AS total_expenses FROM expense_categories JOIN guest_expenses ON expense_categories.id = guest_expenses.id GROUP BY category_name;
SELECT budget_type, SUM(budget_limit) AS total_budget FROM travel_budget GROUP BY budget_type HAVING SUM(budget_limit) > 5000;
SELECT report_date, total_expenditure, budget_type FROM expenditure_reports WHERE total_expenditure > 10000 AND budget_type='Business' ORDER BY report_date DESC;
